channel.title: Sections on NFLDP Genomic Facility
channel.description: Recent content in Sections on NFLDP Genomic Facility

item.title: Who We Are
item.description:
Livestock and fisheries Resource Advancement. “Where science meets sustainability, empowering farmers, researchers, vets, and policymakers with the data that build healthier and more productive animals and a safer future”

We are at the forefront of creating new genomics digital platforms designed to improve the health and productivity of local animal resources. Our initial focus encompasses key livestock species: camels, sheep, cattle, chickens, horses, goats and aquatic resources in the Kingdom.

item.title: What We Do
item.description:
Unlocking Potential: Healthier and productive Animals, Sustainable Practices

We aim to transform the industry in the kingdom and enable data driven economy by accelerating genetic improvement and protecting livestock and fisheries from threats of pathogens. Transforming the domain requires a strategic alignment and enablement from the national strategy of biotechnology, as NFLDP embracing biotech as the main thrust for its progress.

item.title: Why It Matters
item.description:
Positive Impacts: From Farm to all. “This initiative aligns with Vision 2030 and global One Health frameworks”

Our collective efforts are aimed at delivering widespread benefits:

Improve Food Security and Safety: Healthier, more productive animals contribute directly to a more stable, reliable, and safe food supply for growing populations.

Empower Farmers and Producers: Provide innovative tools, data-driven insights, and knowledge resources that help farmers and aquatic producers raise healthier animals more effectively and sustainably.

item.title: Success Stories
item.description:
From data to impact

  • “Tracking Salmonella outbreak in livestock”
  • “Using SNPs to identify conservation targets for Arabian Peninsula breed”
  • “Build reference genome for Arabian Peninsula animals”
  • “Presenting our pioneer work in international scientific conferences"
  • “Got invitations to present our active research Roslin Institute seminar, a world leader in animal health research"
  • “Collaborative AMR surveillance with regional labs"

item.title: Services
item.description:
Comprehensive Genomic Solutions

Enhanced genomic services tailored to your research and breeding needs.

Standard Package

  • Standard genotyping services
  • Basic bioinformatics analysis
  • Standard turnaround times
  • Email support
  • Raw data delivery

Advanced Package

  • Advanced genomic analysis
  • Custom bioinformatics pipelines
  • Priority processing
  • Dedicated project manager
  • Phone/video consultation
  • Interactive reports

Partnership Tier

  • Comprehensive genomic solutions
  • Long-term partnership agreements
  • Custom method development
  • On-site training and support
  • Co-development opportunities

Service Categories

  1. Understanding Animal Genetics – Exploring the Blueprint of Life
  2. Tracking and Understanding Diseases – Proactive Animal Health Management
  3. Data Resources, Visualization & Analytical Tools
View Full Service Catalog

item.title: Contact Us
item.description:
Get in Touch – We’d Love to Hear From You!

Whether you have a question, a suggestion, are interested in collaboration, or want to learn more about our work, our team is here to help.

Email: genome@nfdp.gov.sa

Explore our expanding resources, learn about our pioneering initiatives, and see how data-driven insights are actively shaping the future of livestock management and looking towards healthier aquatic ecosystems.
